content: I'd say that it's always better to do a proper warm-up and stretching routine before practicing martial arts. if you have limited time, you can incorporate dynamic stretching exercises into your martial arts practice to help warm up your muscles and prepare your body for physical activity. however, doing a complete stretch routine separately will help you maximize your flexibility and prevent injuries in the long run. remember that flexibility is an important aspect of martial arts, and taking the time to stretch properly can help you improve your performance and overall wellbeing.
